results.title: Early alveolar bone regeneration in rats after topical administration of simvastatin.
results.journal: Oral Surg Oral Med Oral Pathol Oral Radiol Endod
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: The present study provides evidence that a single topical application of 2.5% @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ gel improves the quality of the new bone and decreases bone @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014091 @@@resorption@@@.
